name: Kana: Little Sister
description:
Kana: Little Sister is an adventure game developed by D.O.. It was originally released in 2002. It was published by G-Collections. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Kana: Little Sister is available on PC.
It was produced by Ryūichirō Fujisawa]]. Takahiro Yatabe]] directed the game. It was scored by Hechima and Hideki Takahashi.
